```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#IMPORT LIBRARIES
library("jsonlite")
library(tables) # pretty tables

#Create data frame for participant file
participant_file <- "data/final_participants.json"
df_participants <- fromJSON(participant_file)
#names(df_participants) #print names of each column in the data frame

#Create factor vectors
EXPLICIT <- factor(df_participants$explicit)
IMPASSE  <- factor(df_participants$impasse)
AXIS  <- factor(df_participants$axis)

num_participants <- nrow(df_participants)
```

## Participant Conditions

We ran **`r num_participants` subjects** in this 3 (explicit scaffold: none, text/image, interactive) X 2 (implicit scaffold: none, impasse) design.   

```{r results = 'asis', echo = FALSE}
#create table of participants by factors (explicit X impasse) 
table <- tabular( (IMPASSE+1)~(EXPLICIT+1), data = df_participants )
table_options(rowlabeljustification="center", justification="right")
html(table,options=htmloptions(head=TRUE))
```
